description:
Blat is a small, efficent SMTP command-line interface (CLI) mailer for Windows. It is the SMTP *sending* part of an eMail User Agent (MUA) or eMail client. As such, Blat sends eMail via SMTP (or internet eMail) from the command line.

Combine with Windows integrated command-line program `at` to schedule sending emails or posting later.

[Philosophy](http://www.blat.net/?philosophy.html)
[FAQ](http://www.blat.net/?faq/index.html)
[Examples](http://www.blat.net/examples/)
[RFC compliance](http://www.blat.net/?RFC.html)
summary: Command-line SMTP mailer and NNTP poster
author: Pedro Mendes, Mark Neal
